#labels Phase-Implementation,Serial
= Serial Commands =

? - Men√º / Hilfe<BR />
a - Show all Parameter<BR />
C - Calibrate_Accel_Offset<BR />
M - Test Motors<BR />
m - Show Control and Motors<BR />
p - Show Parameter px<BR />
P - Receive Parameter P1;xx.x<BR />
r - Show_Receiver_Values()<BR />

T - Calibrate_Remote<BR />
# - Reset_Settings<BR />
`*` - writeUserConfig to flash<BR />
x - stop output
